description.p: bitvue is a professional AV1 bitstream analyzer that provides both CLI and GUI interfaces for analyzing video bitstreams at the syntax element level.

ul.li: OBU Tree Panel - Hierarchical view of all Open Bitstream Units
Syntax Detail Panel - Detailed syntax element information
Bit View Panel - Hex/binary dump with bit-level navigation
Timeline Panel - Frame sequence visualization with bitrate graphs
Frame Viewer Panel - Decoded frame display with zoom and pan
Split View modes for frame comparison
Overlay system: Block Grid, Motion Vectors, QP Heatmap, Partition Structure
JSON export for scripting and automation
GUI with frame viewer and overlay system
Support for IVF, MP4, MKV, WebM, and TS containers
